name: ai-online-assistant-fake-news-detector
description: A tool for identifying fake news articles.

scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend && npm install -s && npm audit fix
scripts.install:nn: cd nn_server && pip3 install -r requirements.txt >> install_log.txt
scripts.install:classifierUtil: cd nn_server/classifier_utilities && pip3 install -r requirements.txt >> install_log.txt
scripts.install:neuralNetworkUtil: cd nn_server/neural_network_utilities && pip3 install -r requirements.txt >> install_log.txt
scripts.install:coreNN: cd nn_server/core_nn && pip3 install -r requirements.txt >> install_log.txt
scripts.install:spellingNN: cd nn_server/nn_spelling_input && pip3 install -r requirements.txt >> install_log.txt
scripts.install:factNN: cd nn_server/nn_fact_input && pip3 install -r requirements.txt >> install_log.txt
scripts.install:db: cd db_server && npm install -s && npm audit fix
scripts.install:api: cd api_server && npm install -s && npm audit fix

author: 5Bits
